alert.note: Alert for Grundy; Kendall (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 30 at 6:31PM CDT until April 30 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN KENDALL AND NORTHWESTERN GRUNDY COUNTIES... At 631 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Morris, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lisbon. Including the following interstate... I-80 between mile markers 104 and 106. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central and northeastern Illinois. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
